meanings.definition: A type of fish commonly found in freshwater lakes and rivers.
meanings.sent1: I caught a big togue while fishing at the lake.
meanings.sent2: The togue swam gracefully in the river.
meanings.sent3: The togue fish told a joke to the trout.
meanings.sent4: The togue darted through the water like a silver arrow.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the togue sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of vegetable commonly used in Asian cuisine.
meanings.sent1: Mom added togue to the stir-fry for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The crunchy togue added a fresh flavor to the salad.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to steal the togue from the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The togue was a green beacon of health on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cooking togue filled the kitchen with a delightful scent.

meanings.definition: A type of clothing accessory worn on the head.
meanings.sent1: She wore a stylish togue to keep her head warm in the winter.
meanings.sent2: The colorful togue matched her outfit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the togue and ran up a tree.
meanings.sent4: The togue perched on her head like a fluffy crown.
meanings.sent5: The cozy togue felt like a soft hug for her head.
